module.title: Info: Pages
module.description: Support for static pages and automatic routing to them.
module.log: Complete redesign with hook on App:onDispatch.
Switch to deny direct access to controller.
Added hook View:onRenderContent for nested pages.
Added hook for sitemap data collection.
Improved sitemap data collection by subpages and order.
Merged SQL updates into SQL install script.
Add pages navigation helper for projects without module UI:Navigation.
Add new page status "deactivated" and avoid access.
Support subpage resolution of module controlled pages.
Add default page content (which is empty) for empty pages.
Allow page resolution of empty node page and redirect to first child.
Redirect module page only if module path is not within linked page.
module.author: Christian Würker
